title: Poetry: The river vine
description: The River Vine (Poetry, #1)- is a part of Vanessa Chattman's poetry series books. This book is the 1st Vol. of the poetry series. The River Vine briefly describes different every day situations and the extent of Vanessa Chattman's creative poetic story telling in the form of suspenseful fiction that flows from the heart of people like a river and is enjoyable for the whole family.
author: Vanessa Chattman
